mapper.select: SELECT A.STO_NO ,A.CONTENTS_CODE ,A.CONTENTS_NO ,A.MEMBER_ID ,B.RES_FILEPATH ,B.RES_NAME FROM STORAGE_TBL A JOIN RESTAURANT_TBL B ON (A.CONTENTS_NO = B.RES_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT A.STO_NO ,A.CONTENTS_CODE ,A.CONTENTS_NO ,A.MEMBER_ID ,B.RES_FILEPATH ,B.RES_NAME FROM STORAGE_TBL A JOIN RESTAURANT_TBL B ON (A.CONTENTS_NO = B.RES_NO AND A.CONTENTS_CODE = 'restaurant') WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT A.STO_NO ,A.CONTENTS_CODE ,A.CONTENTS_NO ,A.MEMBER_ID ,B.ROOM_FILEPATH ,B.ROOM_NAME FROM STORAGE_TBL A JOIN ROOM_TBL B ON (A.CONTENTS_NO = B.ROOM_NO AND A.CONTENTS_CODE = 'room') WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT A.STO_NO ,A.CONTENTS_CODE ,A.CONTENTS_NO ,A.MEMBER_ID ,B.ATTR_FILEPATH ,B.ATTR_NAME FROM STORAGE_TBL A JOIN ATTRACTION_TBL B ON (A.CONTENTS_NO = B.ATTR_NO AND A.CONTENTS_CODE = 'attraction') WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
